text: Aur hum ney samood ki taraf unn kay bhai saleh (alh-e-salam) ko bheja. Unhon ney farmaya aey meri qom! Tum Allah ki ibadat kero uss kay siwa koi tumhara mabood nahi. Tumharay pass tumharay perwerdigar ki taraf say aik wazeh daleel aa chuki hai. Yeh oontni hai Allah ki jo tumharay liye daleel hai so iss ko chor do kay Allah Taalaa ki zamin mein khati phiray aur issko buraee kay sath haath bhi na lagana kay kahin tum ko dard naak azab aa pakray
